lines.text: Oh, you're so COOL, Brewster!
Welcome to Fright Night! For real.

[brandishing a crucifix]
Back, spawn of Satan!

[chuckles]
Oh, really?
[Dandridge grabs the cross, crushes it, and throws it aside]
You have to have faith for this to work on me!
Mr Vincent. I've seen all of your films. And I found them... very amusing!
Jesus, I warned him!
He got me, Charley! He bit me! You know what you're gonna have to do now, don't you? Kill me. Kill me, Charley... before I turn into a vampire, and... GIVE YOU A HICKEY!
Mrs. Brewster. My God, the phone lines have been cut.
[Evil Ed arises from under the bed sheets with a wig on]
I know.
[giggling]
I DID IT!
Where is Charley's mother?

[removes the wig]
Oh, well, she's working nights. BUT!... she left a note.
[He chuckles like a speed freak as he removes the note from his pocket. He reads it]
Mmmmmm mmm! His dinner... is in the oven!
Look, Detective Lennox, Jerry Dandridge is vampire!
Yeah, sure, and I'm Dirty Harry!
[Jerry Dandridge has cornered a terrified Evil Ed into an alley]
Hello, Edward. You don't have to be afraid of me. I know what it's like being different. Only they won't pick on you anymore... or beat you up. I'll see to that. All you have to do is take my hand.

I have just been fired because nobody wants to see vampire killers anymore, or vampires either. Apparently all they want to see are demented madmen running around in ski-masks, hacking up young virgins.
And to what do I owe this dubious pleasure?
[Peter Vincent has just hurt the vampire Evil Ed with a crucifix]
The master will kill you for this! But not fast. Slowly! Oh, so slowly!
You shouldn't lose your temper, Charley. It isn't polite.

[making a veiled threat to Charley]
See you... soon.
[Charley turns to a now believing, now terrified Peter Vincent for help fighting vampires]
That's just a character I played in a movie! Peter Vincent's not even my real name!
I am Peter Vincent, vampire killer!
Now we wouldn't want to wake your mother, would we Charley? 'Cause then I'd have to kill her too, RIGHT?
[Dandrige throws Charley across his room and picks him up by the throat]

Do you realize how much trouble you've caused me, Charley? Spying on me. Almost disturbing my sleep this afternoon. Telling policemen about me! You deserve to die, boy. Of course... I can give you something I don't have. It's a choice. Forget about me, Charley. Forget about me, and I'll forget about you. What do you say, Charley?
[Charley pulls out a small cross from his pocket, but Dandridge catches him and twists it from Charley's hand before he can raise it to Dandridge's face]
Fool!

[Billy lunges out and surprises Charley as Charley is opening the basement storm door]
Hey, Kid! What are you doing?
Nothin'...

[Smiling menacingly]
Oh, yeah? Well, just see that it stays that way... Kid.
Charley, that wasn't the only murder. Second in two days. And get this...
[Smirking]
Both of them had their heads chopped off.
[Chuckling]
Could you believe it?
You're sick.
What's the matter Charley? Afraid I'd never come over without being invited first?
So, did she find out what you're really like?
Get lost, Evil!
Oh, call me anything you want. Only you're the one failing trig, not me.
That bastard! Why didn't he tell us there was going to be a pop quiz?
That's the point of a pop quiz, Brewster... to surprise you.
It was just evil messin' around again... Cut it out evil, it's not funny!
What if he was really in trouble?
Charley, you're not gonna let him sucker you in again are you?
[two bouncers take away Charley and Amy]
I got him!
He's mine.
You want chicken, man, you go someplace else.
Out of my way!
Move me!
[Jerry's hand changes, his eyes glow red, and reveals a set of fangs]
LEON!
Well, what do we have here? Vampire-killers?
[Billy begins to ascend up the stairs, and Peter draws his gun]
Stop... Stop, or I'll shoot.
[Billy ignores him and continues to walk up the stairs]
I'm warning you. Don't force me to shoot!

[Billy still ignores him, and Peter shoots him point blank in the head. His body collides down the stairs as Jerry begins to sneak up behind Charley and Peter. Charley turns around and draws out his cross]
STOP!
[Jerry covers his eyes, whimpering]
We have him.
[Jerry removes his arm from his eyes and looks down at Billy's body at the bottom of the steps]
Do you?
[Jerry smiles and retreats; Charley and Peter are confused]
What did he mean by that?
Nothing! He was just bluffing.
[Behind them, Billy rises... from the dead!]
[after Evil Ed fails to listen to Charley's warning]
No vampire's gonna want him anyway. Probably give him blood poisoning.

[after getting fooled by Evil Ed in the alley]
You're gonna get yours someday.
Oh, yeah. When? When I'm bit by a vampire? There are no such things as vampires, fruitcake!
